org.apache.ignite.spi.loadbalancing.weightedrandom

Interface WeightedRandomLoadBalancingSpiMBean

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IgniteSpiManagementMBean
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    WeightedRandomLoadBalancingSpi

    @MXBeanDescription(value="MBean that provides access to weighted random load balancing SPI configuration.")
public interface WeightedRandomLoadBalancingSpiMBean
extends IgniteSpiManagementMBean
    Management MBean for WeightedRandomLoadBalancingSpi SPI.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getNodeWeight()
      Gets weight of this node.
      boolean isUseWeights()
      Checks whether node weights are considered when doing random load balancing.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.apache.ignite.spi.IgniteSpiManagementMBean

        getIgniteHome, getLocalNodeId, getName, getStartTimestamp, getStartTimestampFormatted, getUpTime, getUpTimeFormatted

    • Method Detail

      • isUseWeights

        @MXBeanDescription(value="Whether node weights are considered when doing random load balancing.")
boolean isUseWeights()
        Checks whether node weights are considered when doing random load balancing.
        Returns:
        If true then random load is distributed according to node weights.

      • getNodeWeight

        @MXBeanDescription(value="Weight of this node.")
int getNodeWeight()
        Gets weight of this node.
        Returns:
        Weight of this node.
